channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- FileNet Content Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- FileNet Content Manager

item.title: CVE-2019-4572|2024-09-17T01:06:18.571Z -- ibm -- filenet%20content%20manager
item.description: IBM FileNet Content Manager 5.5.2 and 5.5.3 in specific configurations, could log the web service user credentials into a log file that could be accessed by an administrator on the local machine. IBM X-Force ID: 166798.

item.title: CVE-2021-38965|2024-09-17T01:00:41.936Z -- ibm -- filenet%20content%20manager
item.description: IBM FileNet Content Manager 5.5.4, 5.5.6, and 5.5.7 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system by sending a specially crafted request. IBM X-Force ID: 212346.

item.title: CVE-2018-1844|2024-09-17T01:31:04.535Z -- ibm -- filenet%20content%20manager
item.description: IBM FileNet Content Manager 5.2.1 and 5.5.0 is vulnerable to a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 150904.
